      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_98340</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_98340</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Techniques on answering Key Stage 3 Science SATs: completing a diagram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Techniken auf antwortender Schlüsselstadium 3 
Wissenschaft SATs: Durchführen eines Diagramms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Techniques sur la Science principale de réponse 
SATs de l'étape 3 : terminer un diagramme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Técnicas na ciência chave respondendo SATs do 
estágio 3: terminando um diagrama</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tecniche su scienza chiave di risposta SATs della
fase 3: completare uno schema</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνικές στην απάντηση του βασικού σταδίου 3 επιστήμη
SATs: ολοκλήρωση ενός διαγράμματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Técnicas en la ciencia dominante SATs de la etapa
que contesta 3: terminar un diagrama</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations showing an experimental set-up to compare the amount of carbon dioxide gas breathed in and out. This illustration shows an incorrectly drawn diagram. The other illustration shows a correctly drawn diagram.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">'carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Breathing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lime-water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen atmete das Zeigen 
einer experimentellen Installation, um die Menge des Kohlendioxydgases
zu vergleichen innen und heraus. Diese Abbildung zeigt ein 
falsch gezeichnetes Diagramm. Die andere Abbildung zeigt ein 
richtig gezeichnetes Diagramm.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations montrer une 
installation expérimentale pour comparer la quantité de gaz 
d'anhydride carbonique a respiré dedans et dehors. Cette 
illustration montre un diagramme inexactement tracé. L'autre 
illustration montre un diagramme correctement tracé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações mostrar uma 
instalação experimental para comparar a quantidade de gás do 
dióxido de carbono respirou dentro e para fora. Esta 
ilustração mostra um diagrama incorretamente desenhado. A 
outra ilustração mostra um diagrama corretamente desenhado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni mostrare una 
messa a punto sperimentale per confrontare la quantità di gas 
dell'anidride carbonica ha respirato dentro e fuori. Questa 
illustrazione mostra uno schema in modo errato tracciato. 
L'altra illustrazione mostra uno schema correttamente tracciato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν πειραματική 
οργάνωση για να συγκρίνει το ποσό διοξειδίου του άνθρακα που 
αναπνέεται αέριο μέσα και έξω. Αυτή η απεικόνιση 
εμφανίζει ανακριβώς συρμένο διάγραμμα. Η άλλη απεικόνιση 
εμφανίζει σωστά συρμένο διάγραμμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones mostrar una 
disposición experimental para comparar la cantidad de gas del 
bióxido de carbono respiró adentro y hacia fuera. Esta 
ilustración muestra un diagrama incorrectamente trazado. La 
otra ilustración muestra un diagrama correctamente trazado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">' Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atmung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalk-Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">'anhydride carbonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Respiration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expérience</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la chaux-eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">' dióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Respirar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">experiência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cal-água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">'anidride carbonica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
